grid.expression: SELECT CAB.NUNOTA, CAB.DTNEG, PAR.NOMEPARC, PAR.TELEFONE, PAR.FAX AS TELEFONE2, PAR.EMAIL, PAR.CEP, LTRIM(ISNULL(EN.TIPO,'') + ' ' + EN.NOMEEND) AS ENDERECO, PAR.NUMEND, ISNULL(PAR.COMPLEMENTO,'') AS COMPLEMENTO, BAI.NOMEBAI, CID.NOMECID, UF.DESCRICAO AS UF FROM sankhya.TGFCAB CAB WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFITE ITE WITH (NOLOCK) ON CAB.NUNOTA = ITE.NUNOTA AND ITE.CODPROD = :CODPROD INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFPAR PAR WITH (NOLOCK) ON CAB.CODPARC = PAR.CODPARC INNER JOIN sankhya.TSIEND EN WITH (NOLOCK) ON EN.CODEND = PAR.CODEND INNER JOIN sankhya.TSIBAI BAI WITH (NOLOCK) ON BAI.CODBAI = PAR.CODBAI INNER JOIN sankhya.TSICID CID WITH (NOLOCK) ON CID.CODCID = PAR.CODCID INNER JOIN sankhya.TSIUFS UF WITH (NOLOCK) ON UF.CODUF = CID.UF WHERE ITE.CODPROD = :CODPROD AND CAB.AD_STATUSPGTO = 'E' AND CAB.DTNEG BETWEEN :DTINI AND :DTFIM AND CAB.CODTIPOPER = 550
